title: Bill Announcement – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Law & Justice	

Issued on:
August 9, 2019
On Friday, August 9, 2019, the President signed into law:H.R. 1569, which adds Flagstaff and Yuma to the list of locations where court must be held in the United States Judicial District of Arizona; andH.R. 2695, which renames the Success Dam in Tulare County, California, as the “Richard L. Schafer Dam.”
